mapper.sql: ID, MENU_NO, MENU, PARENT_ID, MENU_TYPE, URL,M_ORDER,S_ORDER
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_a_right e WHERE e.MENU_NO in(SELECT d.RIGHT_ID FROM t_a_role_right d WHERE d.ROLE_ID in(SELECT c.ROLE_ID FROM t_a_group_role c WHERE c.GROUP_ID in(SELECT b.ID FROM t_a_group b WHERE b.id in(SELECT a.GROUP_ID FROM t_a_account_group a WHERE a.U_ID=#{uid}) OR b.G_PARENT IN(SELECT a.GROUP_ID FROM t_a_account_group a WHERE a.U_ID=#{uid}))))
SELECT a.*,IFNULL(b.ID,'0') RRID ,IFNULL(ROLE_ID,'0') ROLE_ID, IFNULL(Right_ID,'0') Right_ID FROM t_a_right a LEFT JOIN t_a_role_right b on a.ID=b.RIGHT_ID and b.ROLE_ID=#{rid}
